value.info_text:
Steam generator that permanently creates 0.0 steam per turn.

Can be activated for an instant burst of 0 steam.
value.name: Implant: Steam Generator

value2.info_text:
Steam generator that permanently creates 0 steam per turn.

Can be activated for an instant burst of 0 steam.
value2.name: Implant: Steam Generator

value.info_text: Your undead skin hardens under stress. Each charge of death momentum also increases all flat damage resistance by 1, 3, 4, 6, 7.
value.name: Dead Hide

value2.info_text: Your undead skin hardens under stress. Each charge of death momentum also increases all flat damage resistance by 2, 5, 8, 10, 12.
value2.name: Dead Hide

value.info_text:
You summon your undead energies to instantly build up death momentum to its maximum possible charges.

The effect will only start to decrease after 4, 7, 9, 11, 12 turns.

In addition, the death momentum effect also grants +3%, +3%, +4%, +5%, +5% to all damage per charge.
value.name: Lifeless Rush

value2.info_text:
You summon your undead energies to instantly build up death momentum to its maximum possible charges.

The effect will only start to decrease after 4, 7, 9, 11, 12 turns.

In addition, the death momentum effect also grants +4%, +7%, +10%, +12%, +14% to all damage per charge.
value2.name: Lifeless Rush

value.info_text:
Firmly plant your steamsaws in the ground, using them to propel yourself very quickly (+320%, +398%, +459%, +510%, +556% movement speed).

Any foes on either side of your movement get wrecked by the saws, knocking them 3 tiles away from you.

Attacking or using any talent will break this effect.

When this effect is broken or cancelled the sudden change in motion deals 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% weapon damage to all foes around you.

The wheels of death! Amazing!
value.name: Saw Wheels

value2.info_text:
Firmly plant your steamsaws in the ground, using them to propel yourself very quickly (+320%, +398%, +459%, +510%, +556% movement speed).

Any foes on either side of your movement get wrecked by the saws, damaging them for 60%, 73%, 82%, 91%, 98% weapon damage and knocking them 3 tiles away from you.

Attacking or using any talent will break this effect.

The wheels of death! Amazing!
value2.name: Saw Wheels

value.info_text:
Spin your saws wildly around you to create a wall of steamy sawteeth.

All melee damage against you is reduced by 13%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27%, you have 13%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% chance to evade projectiles and you can never take a blow that deals more than 94%, 81%, 73%, 69%, 66% of your max life.

Split their bones on the saws of death!
value.name: Grinding Shield

value2.info_text:
Spin your saws wildly around you to create a wall of steamy sawteeth.

All melee damage against you is reduced by 13%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27%, you have 13%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% chance to evade projectiles and you can never take a blow that deals more than 74%, 61%, 53%, 49%, 46% of your max life.

Split their bones on the saws of death!
value2.name: Grinding Shield

value.info_text:
Slam your saws into your target, dealing 100% weapon damage + 12%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 33% per physical, magical, or mental effect on them (up to 7 effects).

Sustains are not effects.

The Metal Punisher!
value.name: Punishment

value2.info_text:
Slam your saws into your target, dealing 100% weapon damage + 22%, 31%, 36%, 40%, 43% per physical, magical, or mental effect on them (up to 7 effects).

Sustains are not effects.

The Metal Punisher!
value2.name: Punishment

value.info_text:
You have lived through many battles, and your experience makes you a gritty veteran.

Saw Wheels end of effect attack increased by 17%, 44%, 65%, 82%, 97%.

Grinding Shield lets you live below your normal limits, up to -81, -154, -209, -256, -298 life.

Punishment has a 36%, 57%, 73%, 86%, 98% chance to have its cooldown reduced by 1 for each effect.

Domination for all!
value.name: Battlefield Veteran

value2.info_text:
You have lived through many battles, and your experience makes you a gritty veteran.

Saw Wheels steam drain is reduced by 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

Grinding Shield lets you live below your normal limits, up to -81, -154, -209, -256, -298 life.

Punishment has a 36%, 57%, 73%, 86%, 98% chance to have its cooldown reduced by 1 for each effect.

Domination for all!
value2.name: Battlefield Veteran

value.info_text:
Continuously swing your steamsaws around you, dealing 30% weapon damage to adjacent foes each time you attack.

Your chaotic motions make it difficult for anything to hit you, granting 17%, 22%, 25%, 28%, 30% chance to completely negate all damage.

Damage avoidance chance increases with Steampower.

Make the metal talk!
value.name: Tempest of Metal

value2.info_text:
Continuously swing your steamsaws around you, dealing 30% weapon damage to adjacent foes each turn.

Your chaotic motions make it difficult for anything to hit you, granting 22%, 28%, 32%, 36%, 40% chance to completely negate all damage.

Damage avoidance chance increases with Steampower.

Make the metal talk!
value2.name: Tempest of Metal

value.info_text:
You temporarily overcharge the saw motors, increasing the effective talent level of all saw talents by 26%, 30%, 33%, 35%, 36% for 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.

The pain shall never stop!
value.name: Overcharge Saws

value2.info_text: You temporarily overcharge the saw motors, increasing the effective talent level of all saw talents by 26%, 30%, 33%, 35%, 36% for 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.
value2.name: Overcharge Saws

value.info_text:
Using psionic forces you maintain in place on your back two giant horrific mechanical arms.

Each basic turn (as if you had 100% speed) they can automatically attack up to 2 foes within range 3 with a mindstar attack doing 95%, 110%, 121%, 131%, 139% weapon damage.

Creatures harassed by the mechanical arms have their damage reduced by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 5 turns.
value.name: Mechanical Arms

value2.info_text:
Using psionic forces you maintain in place on your back two giant horrific mechanical arms.

Each turn they can automatically attack up to 2 foes within range 3 with a mindstar attack doing 95%, 110%, 121%, 131%, 139% weapon damage.

Creatures harassed by the mechanical arms have their damage reduced by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 5 turns.
value2.name: Mechanical Arms

value.info_text:
While Furnace is on your armour is so hot from the furnace it dissipates parts of all energy based attacks against you.

All non physical, non mind damage is reduced by 19, 28, 37, 46, 55 (current 19, 28, 37, 46, 55).

Each turn this happens you gain a molten point (up to 10), decreasing the efficiency of the reduction by 25%.

Molten points are removed upon running or resting.

Hot liquid metal, the fun!
value.name: Molten Metal

value2.info_text:
Your armour is so hot from the furnace it dissipates parts of all energy based attacks against you.

All non physical, non mind damage is reduced by 19, 28, 37, 46, 55 (current 19, 28, 37, 46, 55).

Each turn this happens you gain a molten point (up to 10), decreasing the efficiency of the reduction by 25%.

Molten points are removed upon running or resting.

Hot liquid metal, the fun!
value2.name: Molten Metal

value.info_text:
Open the vents on your furnace, creating a conic blast dealing up to 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage at 10 molten points (currently 0.00).

All molten points are consumed.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.

By fire be purged!
value.name: Furnace Vent

value2.info_text:
Open the vents on your furnace, creating a conic blast dealing up to 328, 445, 536, 612, 680 fire damage at 10 molten points (currently 0.00).

All molten points are consumed.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.

By fire be purged!
value2.name: Furnace Vent

value.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using steamguns.

When your bullets hit a target your instinctively reach out to the impact and use the kinetic force to project a mindstar attack doing 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% damage (guaranteed hit), if you wield one in the offhand.

This projection requires a pure mindstar, it will no work if extended into a psiblade.

Also activable for a shoot that deals 140%, 162%, 178%, 191%, 204% weapon damage as mind damage.
value.name: Psyshot

value2.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using steamguns.

When your bullets hit a target your instinctively reach out to the impact and use the kinetic force to project a mindstar attack doing 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% damage (guaranteed hit), if you wield one in the offhand.

Also activable for a shoot that deals 140%, 162%, 178%, 191%, 204% weapon damage as mind damage.
value2.name: Psyshot

value.info_text:
Hits the target on the arms with one rotating saw doing 130%, 143%, 152%, 161%, 168% damage and trying to maim it for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

Maimed foes deal 23%, 33%, 37%, 40%, 42% less damage.

The chance improves with your Physical power.

Cutting your foes has never been so simple!
value.name: To The Arms

value2.info_text:
Hits the target on the arms with one rotating saw doing 130%, 143%, 152%, 161%, 168% damage and trying to maim it for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

Maimed foes deal 33%, 44%, 53%, 61%, 67% less damage.

The chance improves with your Physical power.

Cutting your foes has never been so simple!
value2.name: To The Arms

value.info_text: Your understanding of physiology allows you to apply your reflexes in new ways. Whenever you would receive damage (from any source) greater than 26%, 19%, 16%, 14%, 13% of your maximum life you reduce that damage by 7.9%, 14%, 18%, 21%, 23% (based on your Defense).
value.name: Reflex Defense

value2.info_text: Your understanding of physiology allows you to apply your reflexes in new ways. Whenever you would receive damage (from any source) greater than 26%, 19%, 16%, 14%, 13% of your maximum life you reduce that damage by 8.0%, 14%, 18%, 21%, 24% (based on your Defense).
value2.name: Reflex Defense

value.info_text:
When your life dips below 50% of your total life an automated process turns some of your lower skin layers (or other internal organs) into a thick metallic layer for 6 turns.

While the effect lasts all damage done to you is reduced by a flat amount equal to 100% of your Constitution.

This effect can only trigger once every 10 turns.
value.name: Subcutaneous Metallisation

value2.info_text:
When your life dips below 50% of your total life an automated process turns some of your lower skin layers (or other internal organs) into a thick metallic layer for 6 turns.

While the effect lasts all damage done to you is reduced by a flat amount equal to 150% of your Constitution.
value2.name: Subcutaneous Metallisation

value.info_text: When you deal a critical hit your embedded system activates, increasing all your primary stats except Strength by 50% of your Strength for 6 turn.
value.name: Pain Enhancement System
require: Level 30, Str 50; Earned the achievement 'Size Is Everything' on this character.

value2.info_text: When you deal a critical hit your embedded system activates, increasing all your primary stats by 40% of your Strength for 6 turn.
value2.name: Pain Enhancement System
require: Level 30, Str 50; Earned the achievement 'Size Is Everything' on this character.
